LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Nomad.label: ODC Nomad Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Nomad.description: Power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Spacer.label: ODC Spacer Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Spacer.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Recon.label: ODC Recon Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Recon.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves shooting skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Duelist.label: ODC Duelist Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Duelist.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves melee skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Trader.label: ODC Trader Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Trader.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves trader skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Beastmaster.label: ODC Beastmaster Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Beastmaster.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves animal skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Constructor.label: ODC Constructor Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Constructor.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves crafting skills to the owner.

LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Miner.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves mining skills to the owner.

LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Medic.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves medical skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Prestige.label: ODC Lord Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Prestige.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves psychic powers to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Mechanitor.label: ODC Overseer Mask
LanguageData.ODC_Helmet_Mechanitor.description: Moded power armor Mask, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Nomad.label: ODC Nomad Armor
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Nomad.description: Power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon.label: ODC Recon Armor
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon.description: Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.\n\nRecon version improves shooting skills to the owner.
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon_Spacer.label: ODC Recon Armor(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon_Spacer.description:
Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

Recon version improves shooting skills to the owner.

Pressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon_Smoker.label: ODC Recon Armor(Fogler)
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon_Smoker.description:
Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

Recon version improves shooting skills to the owner.

Modified with the addition of a Smokepop pack.

LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Recon_Shield.description:
Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

Recon version improves shooting skills to the owner.

Modified with the addition of a Reinforced Barrier.

Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_ODC_TurretPack.label: ODC turret pack capsule
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Stalker_Direwolf.label: ODC Stalker Armor(Elder Direwolf)
LanguageData.ODC_Armor_Stalker_Direwolf.description:
Moded power armor, good protects the owner. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.

Stalker version is enhanced with trophies taken from Elder Beasts, empowering the wearer with beast-like power.

Modified with the essence of an Elder Direwolf.
